casebody.data:
CORWIN
v.
BRITISH AMERICAN TOBACCO PLC, et al. 56PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Alan W. Duncan, Attorney at Law, Stephen M. Russell, Jr., Attorney at Law, Jason M. Leviton, Attorney at Law, Joel A. Fleming, Attorney at Law, for Corwin, Robert (Dr.), et al. Michael L. Robinson, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, H. Brent Helms, Attorney at Law, Gary A. Bornstein, Attorney at Law, for British American Tobacco PLC. Ronald R. Davis, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, W. Andrew Copenhaver, Attorney at Law, James A. Dean, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, Robert C. Micheletto, Attorney at Law, Thomas E. Lynch, Attorney at Law, Andrew S. Kleinfeld, Attorney at Law, for Reynolds American, Inc., et al. James P. McLoughlin, Jr., Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Mark A. Nebrig, Attorney at Law, Jonathan M. Watkins, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Karen Seymour, Attorney at Law, Frank Schall, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Jobin, Luc, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of May 2017 by W. Andrew Copenhaver for Leave to Withdraw:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."
